mdRecord.dcterms:title: Visitors at Mount Vernon - Coach House, July 10, 1896
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photograph of three unidentified visitors outside the coach house at Mount Vernon. The visitors include two women and one man standomg near gated entrance of building. A handwritten note at the top of the photograph reads, "at Washington's Coach House, July 10 - 1896." Beneath the image an additional caption with manicule notes, "The Coach is in there." Due to fading, it's nearly impossible to see the interior space. The photograph is adhered to a cardboard mount with embossed edges.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Coach house
